short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save up to 5 articles at a time and be prompted to read the saved articles before saving more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save up to 5 articles at a time and be prompted to read the saved articles before saving more. 

Stay focused and declutter your reading list with 5HeadNews!

I created this just to simply help people bookmark some articles more efficiently. I find myself looking at articles briefly before saving them to read later on a stickynote or emailing to myself so I just wanted something simple I could save on Chrome. I wanted it to be a short-term solution (versus normal bookmarking) so once you were done reading, you could simple delete it. 

Nothing else - barebones extension, hope you find some use for it.
